title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, push, list, delete models via simple API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same generate/chat/embed API surface as Python.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package offering Ollama LLM, chat and embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoints).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper with syntax highlighting, history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s UI and inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & autoscaling support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java SDK for Ollama covering generate, chat, embeddings and model management APIs.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo showing Retrieval-Augmented Generation with Ollama, LangChain & Chroma locally.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JavaScript/TypeScript bindings for the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package: lightweight Python client for Ollama’s generate, chat, embed, pull, push APIs.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration offering OllamaGenerator & OllamaChatGenerator nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET SDK with async generate, chat, embeddings and model management.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.
